amendatorysection.para: Property conveyed by the Game and Parks Commission pursuant to section 90-276 is conveyed with the intent that the property continue to be managed for public access and for public outdoor recreation opportunities, in a safe and sanitary manner, and in compliance with all relevant provisions and responsibilities outlined within prior covenants, easements, and agreements hereby transferred, including continued maintenance of the federally funded public boating access facilities existing on the property, which is specifically assigned through 2013.
